Customise the outlook of the shiny app

Giorgio Comai

2019-11-20

Source: vignettes/customise_the_outlook_of_the_app.Rmd
customise_the_outlook_of_the_app.Rmd

The [fresh](https://github.com/dreamRs/fresh) package facilitates customising Shiny app.

create_theme(
  adminlte_global(
    content_bg = "#FFF"
  ),
  adminlte_sidebar(
    dark_bg = "#80829a",
    dark_hover_bg = "#53486c"
  ),
  adminlte_color(
    light_blue = "#3f2d54",
    aqua = "#75b8d1",
    green = "#c9d175",
    red = "#d175b8",
    purple = "#3f2d54",
    yellow = "#d1ab75"
  )
)

Developed by Giorgio Comai.

Site built with pkgdown 1.4.1.
